website_summaries.verdict: A high daily dose of prebiotics and probiotics to kick-start your cat’s gut health recovery, and a 30-day supply of pre-measured packets is a great deal for the price.
pros: Easily dissolved in water or food
Promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria
Builds up a cat’s digestive and bowel health
cons: Although flavorless and odorless, the pickiest cats may turn their noses up at this supplement

customer_reviews.title: I tried this product because two of my three cats ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because two of my three cats were throwing up their meals every day. I could hardly keep up with them. This had been going on for a couple of years, so I decided what could I lose. Well, I can't praise this product enough. The throwing up has diminished by 90%!!! What else can I say? Thank you Tomlyn.
customer_reviews.author: b-run

customer_reviews.title: Not only for water!
customer_reviews.text: I think the company really hurt sales by making it sound like you have to use this in water. I tasted it and it is completely tasteless so I sprinkle it on their food and their treats. I also bought FortiFlora another good one, with a fishy taste, I sprinkle that on their fish flavored treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great poo remedy
customer_reviews.text: My cat has chronic soft poo for over 3 months. I've tried many products including other probiotics without any change. On the second week it started to harden! Easy to give. Cat doesn't taste it. Easy to use. Have to re order
customer_reviews.author: A. Dimella

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cats life
customer_reviews.text: My cat had vomiting and diarrhea, she was losing so much weight that she was just skin and bones, the veterinarian couldn't really find anything wrong with her but I thought she had gastroenteritis. I found this product on amazon, what attracted me was that it was a water soluble powder, tasteless and easy to add to her food. I add a small amount to her wet food daily and slowly she has improved and is gaining back her weight. I truly believe this product has saved her life.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: No flavor so it is easily placed in any cat food and my kitty eats it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product as it has no scent to turn cat away nor any bad taste. Easily mixes into all cat foods. Helps with IBS which my kitty has.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Love I can buy these from Amazon. Whenever I change foods, or kitties have a little tummy trouble, I sprinkle a packet of this tasteless powder on their food and everything improves.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perrigoue

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have done the trick for my 13 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have done the trick for my 13 year cat. However it doesn't tell you on the package how long they should take it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire P. Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Seems as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The powder is odorless and tasteless. It dissolves really well in my cat's canned wet food (Fancy Feast) and he eats it all, so he must not be able to taste it. He's a relatively picky eater, so I think it's a good endorsement that he'll eat the dissolved powder no problem. The pre and probiotic did not solve his diarrhea issues, but the vet things he might have IBD, so that's not a failure of this product necessarily. Overall, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be ok
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good product. I can only put it in my cats food, they wouldn't drink water that I had put it in though. The pro to using the FortiFlora by purina is they like the taste. I wish this would have worked in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Cats don’t seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if the product is any good since my cats won’t go near it. And I have a cat who inhales his food, and yet he leave this stuff alone...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: MY CAT WILL ACTUALLY EAT THIS STUFF AND IT WORKS ON HIS GI TRACT
customer_reviews.author: Otis A. Glamore

customer_reviews.title: works good for kitty
customer_reviews.text: works great for my "upset tummy" kitty he loves it on his food!
customer_reviews.author: pekego

customer_reviews.title: Good for different ailments.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this for some stray kittens to help them transition to new food, and it helped them a lot, but I had a bunch left over and decided to use it in our adult cats and I haven seen a puke pile since I started using it! I mix it in with canned food and they have no idea it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and it works!
customer_reviews.text: My cats were on antibiotics causing them to have loose stool. This product worked quickly! I gave them a packet a day mixed with their wet food and their digestion came back to normal! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MJadro

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the line product.  Just fair, better than nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the quality I wanted, wish the probiotic was closer to 50 billion. Easily dissolvable, no smell or taste though, makes it nice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shipes

customer_reviews.title: mix it with  wet food
customer_reviews.text: try to keep my cat regular; took her to vet, gave medicine, cat wouldn't take it, so i thought i would try this. still taking it
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Made things worse for my 13 year old cat.
customer_reviews.text: Is giving my cat worse symptoms. Very soft stools and stinky. Trying something else. Can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seeing no change.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any difference in my cats breath or bm's. May be I haven't used it long enough. Seller was great though.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.text: Dissolves quickly, cats don't hesitate to drink, seem spunkier, but really, I neither tasted or smelled it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Too close to Expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice however It was less than two months to the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps kitty’s tummy.
customer_reviews.text: The cats eat this brand. Has helped with the vomiting.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this Product my cats no longer have a smelly litter box! They are happier and you can tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Husband read product should be given to cats for health.
customer_reviews.author: Calico

customer_reviews.title: Cats don’t like
customer_reviews.text: My cats didn’t really like this. The prefer the one from the vet... the leading probiotic for cats. This one is good as far as being smell-less. I’m not sure how the taste is, lol.
customer_reviews.author: sriniv

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre-Probiotics!
customer_reviews.text: These pre/probiotics are great. My dear cat had recently a hairball situation that went bad and among the things we did, we tried Tomlyn's pre/probiotics. Since then, we see she has returned to her normal self and we're hoping this will continue to help her ease her hairball troubles. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to feed....
customer_reviews.text: Water soluble makes it easy to feed the cats either mix with the wet food or syringe feed for those who don't like wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pre/probiotic for cats
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tasteless and mixes well with wet cat food. I also sprinkle on dry food. My cat Cleopatra has stopped her occaisional vomiting, and her fur is shinier. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful during/after antibiotics.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very sensitive and has Inflammatory Bowel Disease. Many probiotics have flavorings that she can’t handle. The Tomlyn product works well for her after dental work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic gave my cat terrible gas that other brands have not.
customer_reviews.author: Eyemsue

customer_reviews.title: Better Cats
customer_reviews.text: My Cats were getting sick just about everyday now it has helped with that . Very happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Antonette Zachman

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: No taste or smell identified by my cats. Mix it in their food. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This caused my cat to have bad diarrhea. I am very familiar with probitics, and his reaction is no where near what is normal. I've also used the natural hairball remedy from Tomlyn, and that caused him to throw up for hours.
customer_reviews.author: A2

customer_reviews.title: Help is on the way!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my cat who always gets upper respiratory infections and has to be treated with antibiotics to help her get back to normal digestion! Curbs her diarrhea right away!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crafton-Faulk

customer_reviews.title: My cat is better
customer_reviews.text: Although I rated all the above. I don't take this my cat does. However he is not vomiting as much as he used to. I see a plus in that.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tetreault

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in 2 days as stated. That being said I cannot rate the flavor, scent or thickness as I did not try it myself. I also cannot speak for other cats. My cats would not touch it either on their food or in their water. This is the first time I have ever seen either of them drink out of the toilet. "Results may vary"
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brumsey

customer_reviews.title: Works as substitute for Fortiflora
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after using a box of flortiflora, which was prescribed by my vet for my 1 yr old cat but as we all know is very expensive. Fortiflora worked well but I wanted to explore cheaper options. Have been using this cheaper brand for about a couple weeks now and it’s working just as well for my cat. Seems like there is more powder you have to use than Fortiflora but that’s the only significant difference to me. Because of this I mix half a sachet into wet food in the morning and night, coming out to one sachet a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: seems like it made things worse. does not work with my cat. gut hurt and stinky loose poop. read label 1st
customer_reviews.author: noname

product_meta.title: Tomlyn Pre & Probiotic Powder for Cats, 30ct
feature_bullets: Water-soluble pre- and probiotic powder for cats, supports balanced microbial flora, easy to deliver
Contains 4 billion CFUs of probiotics, helps maintain balanced microbial flora for good bowel health
Added prebiotics support the growth of beneficial bacteria that naturally occur in healthy guts
Individually-sealed packets of flavorless pre- and probiotic powder for convenient daily use
Veterinarian recommended cat oral probiotic powder with five different types of probiotic bacteria

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
